label: PRF – Pending Quotations
description: Submitted requests waiting for supplier quotations.

label: PRF – Agubalaa Started
description: Prices collected via phone, website, or in-person. Internal Agubalaa form used.

label: PRF – QR Sent to Vendors
description: Quotation Request sent directly to selected vendors.

label: PRF – Iulaan Published
description: Public advertisement (Iulaan) published to invite quotations.

label: PRF – Vendor Quotations Received
description: Quotations received from vendors. Preparing for price comparison.

label: PRF – Price Finalized, PO Preparation
description: Best quotation selected or price confirmed. PO is being prepared.

label: PRF – On Hold: Spec/Qty Change
description: Request temporarily paused due to changes in quantity or specifications. Waiting for clarification before continuing.

label: PO Sent – Awaiting Delivery
description: Purchase Orders sent to vendors; goods/services not yet delivered.

label: Partially Received – Awaiting Balance
description: Items/services received in part. Pending full delivery.

label: Goods/Services Received – Pending Payment
description: Goods/services fully received. Bills pending or under payment processing.
